member.name: P:Sandcastle.Tools.BuildComponents.UI.Properties.Resources.CreateSandcastleDB
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to -- NOTE: Change the file locations if necessary CREATE DATABASE [Sandcastle] ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'Sandcastle', FILENAME = N'C:\Databases\Sandcastle.mdf' ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'Sandcastle_log', FILENAME = N'C:\Databases\Sandcastle_log.ldf' ) GO
USE [Sandcastle] GO
-- Member ID URLs table CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MemberIdUrls]( [TargetKey] [varchar](2048) NOT NULL, [MemberUrl] [varchar](2048) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_MemberIdUrls] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [TargetKey] ASC ) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [P [rest of string was truncated]";.
